short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly flip a coin with our online coin flipping simulator. You can either get heads or tails that will help you make a decision.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
▶️ Flip a Coin Online

Flip a coin online for free. Quickly make a decision with this coin flipping simulator.

Coinflipper.com is an online coin flipping simulator. It allows you to virtually flip a coin as if you’re flipping a real coin. This simulator is perfect for anyone that doesn’t have a real coin and needs to make a decision.

Our coin flipper is completely random and will give you a 50/50 chance.

We hope you enjoy our tool!
